comment.author: 66709427@N04
comment._content: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/kzirkel] Ken it is in fact a youth hostel, and although I am biased ( I work for HI-New England) I think its one of the best in the world! You can see updated photos on our Facebook page, www.facebook.com/media/set/?set=a.131142393583312.15554.1...
